Position control

Position control related

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
control_interval_usint30000Requested or expected nominal control interval [us].
control_interval_error_ratiofloat1.2Defines how much measured control interval can deviate from requested/nominal (e.g. 1.3 means 30%).
control_interval_max_stdev_usint1000Maximum standard deviation of measured control interval [us].
nav_point_x_offsetfloat0.0Navigation point longitudinal offset from vehicle center, positive forwards.
nav_point_y_offsetfloat0.0Navigation point lateral offset from vehicle center, positive to the left.
pc_predict_msint100Motor controller delay from output value change to change in feedback.
pc_max_dist_errfloat0.2Maximum distance error from the route.
pc_max_head_errfloat180.0Maximum heading error to the target heading on the route.
pc_start_err_factorfloat1.0Determines maximum distance error [m] from the route at the start of drive order (multiplies pc_max_dist_err).
pc_start_err_max_travelled_distfloat1.0Maximum travelled distance [m] from the start of drive order when larger deviation from route is allowed
pc_start_err_max_dist_to_traj_startfloatFLT_MAXMaximum distance [m] to the first point of trajectory to allow the larger deviation at start to activate.
pc_pid_heading_pfloat4.0Position control gain for the heading error. The higher the gain the faster the AGV tries to minimize the heading error on the route.
pc_pid_dist_pfloat4.0Position control gain for the distance error. The higher the gain the faster the AGV tries to minimize the distance error on the route.
pc_pid_rot_dtfloat0.05Interval [s] defining travel distance for final heading compensation of curvature generated distance error in position controller, approx equal to control interval.
pc_starting_speedfloat0.1Speed at the start of trajectory. Target speed is set to this speed at minimum, even with slower acceleration parameter. Set 0.0 to disable.
pc_pid_speed_settingfloat[]0.0Change position control gain parameters based on speed. This parameter array defines the speed thresholds [m/s] to apply the associated control parameters. 0.0 = disabled
pc_pid_speed_dist_pfloat[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's distance error in different speeds. Speed thresholds are defined with parameter array pc_pid_speed_setting.
pc_pid_speed_heading_pfloat[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error in different speeds. Speed thresholds are defined wiht parameter array pc_pid_speed_setting.
pc_pid_docking_dist_limitfloat[]0.0Change position control gain paramters after the distance to docking target is smaller than the threshold defined in this parameter array. 0.0 = disabled
pc_pid_docking_dist_pfloat[]0.0Position control gains to minimze AGV's distance error based on the distance to the docking target. Distance thresholds are defined in parameter array pc_pid_docking_dist_limit.
pc_pid_docking_heading_pfloat[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error based on the distance to the docking target. Distance thresholds are defined in the parameter array pc_pid_docking_dist_limit.
pc_start_drive_with_pivot_if_head_err_degfloat5.0Defines the minimum heading error of the AGV to the reference that the AGV is commanded to pivot at the start of the drive. Enable with pc_start_drive_with_pivot.
pc_predict_use_accint1Use acceleration in predicting future machine position.
pc_predict_acc_filter_coeffloat0.3Acceleration lowpass filter coefficient for position prediction.
pc_fuzzy_control_enabledint0Position control, distance and heading, performed by fuzzy controller, instead of P-controller.
pc_pid_heading_p_loadedfloat0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error when AGV is carrying a load. 0.0 = disabled
pc_pid_dist_p_loadedfloat0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's distance error when AGV is carrying a load. 0.0 = disabled
pc_pid_speed_setting_loadedfloat[]0.0Change position control gain parameters for loaded AGV based on speed. This parameter defines the speed thresholds [m/s] to apply the assoiciated control parameters. 0.0 = disabled
pc_pid_speed_heading_p_loadedfloat[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error in different speeds when AGV is carrying a load. Speed thresholds are defined with parameter array pc_pid_speed_setting_loaded.
pc_pid_speed_dist_p_loadedfloat[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's distance error in different speeds when AGV is carrying a load. Speed thresholds are defined wiht parameter array pc_pid_speed_setting_loaded.
pc_pid_load_weight_kgfloat[]0.0Change position control gain parameters based on the load weight. This parameter array defines the weight thresholds [kg] to apply the associated control parameters. 0.0 = disabled
pc_pid_speed_heading_p_loaded1float[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error in different speeds when over the first weight threshold.
pc_pid_speed_dist_p_loaded1float[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's distance error in different speeds when over the first weight threshold.
pc_pid_speed_heading_p_loaded2float[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error in different speeds when over the second weight threshold.
pc_pid_speed_dist_p_loaded2float[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's distance error in different speeds when over the second weight threshold.
pc_pid_speed_heading_p_loaded3float[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's heading error in different speeds when over the third weight threshold.
pc_pid_speed_dist_p_loaded3float[]0.0Position control gains to minimize AGV's distance error in different speeds when over the third weight threshold.
pc_min_ref_vfloat0.001Minimum reference speed [m/s].
pc_stop_distance_offsetfloat0.0Stopping distance offset if AGV stops too early or too late to reach the end point. Apply negative offset if AGV stops too late.
pc_direction_change_wait_msint500Time to be stopped when changing direction, 0 to change direction without zeroing reference velocity.
pc_final_speed_lim_enableint0
pc_virtual_tag_activeint1Defines the reported virtual tags: 0 = report last seen virtual tag, 1 = report only active virtual tag
pc_s300_zone_violation_as_warning_zone2int11 = use S300 protection zone violation bits as warning zone 2, meaning only slowing down on zone violation.
pc_fstop_on_estopint11 = go to FSTOP state when emergency stop is active.
pc_soft_stop_enabledint0Enables slowing down with a speed ramp in case of error, drive abort or pause.
pc_soft_stop_obs_wheel_decfloat0.5Deceleration rate when slowing down due to an obstacle.
pc_soft_slow_wheel_speedfloat0.3The maximum wheel speed reference during soft slow. Speed is ramped down to this value if it was higher.
pc_soft_slow_raw_conf_limitfloat0.0When raw position confidence drops below this value, soft slow will be triggered.
pc_soft_slow_conf_limitfloat0.0When filtered position confidence drops below this value, soft slow will be triggered.
pc_abort_drive_if_curtrajpoint_not_moving_timer_msint0Defines how long the wheels must be moving while the AGV does not before drive is aborted. 0 = check disabled
pc_abort_drive_if_curtrajpoint_not_moving_max_dist_from_endfloat0.3Distance from the trajectory end within which aborting the drive is allowed based on wheel slipping.
pc_abort_drive_if_curtrajpoint_not_moving_activate_errorint1Defines if an abort from navigation point not moving should raise an error that requires acknowledgement.
pc_max_wait_time_for_agv_to_stop_before_braking_msint2000Maximum time to wait after sending zero references for the AGV to stop before applying brakes.
pc_end_gain_distfloat0.0Distance from stop point to activate end position control gains which are dynamically adjusted when arriving the stop point. 0 = disable, recommended value 1
pc_end_gain1float6.0Used in the dynamic calculation of the end proportional gains for position control of both heading and distance.
pc_end_gain2float0.02Used in the dynamic calculation of the end proportional gains for position control of both heading and distance.
pc_end_max_gainfloat4.0Maximum proportional gain to adjust the end position control gain values.
pc_end_min_gainfloat1.0Sets a minimum for the end position control gain value for distance.
pc_on_route_err_scalefloat0.8Multiplier for distance and heading error limits to apply for on route check (has to be < 1 to avoid false positives).
pc_max_nearpoint_lookahead_dist_mfloat1.0Limit position controller nearpoint lookahead distance [m]. This prevents loop skipping in long segments.
ref_speed_scalefloat1.0Scale for reference speed [m/s].
poscont_max_interval_msint400Maximum allowed interval [ms] between position control updates.
pc_max_end_distfloat0.2Defines the AGVs distance from destination symbolic point to consider target being reached after the drive is ready.
pc_same_point_distfloat0.002Distance limit to consider two route points to be the same.
pc_step_lengthfloat0.01Distance [m] between trajectory points.
pc_step_length_error_tolerancefloat0.01Defines the acceptable error tolerance [%] for the trajectory step length.
max_speed_difffloat0.1Expected accuracy of the speed control. Error will be set if measured value differs from the reference for speed_timer_s amount of time.
max_prediction_distfloat0.3Maximum distance the AGVs position is predicted on the route for position control.
pc_speed_resolutionfloat0.001Resolution for speed.
pc_stopped_speed_limitfloat0.0005Speeds lower than this limit are regarded as not moving.
pc_stopped_time_limit_msint1000Minimum time limit [ms] for speed to be higher then pc_stopped_speed_limit so AGV will be considered as moving.

Pivoting

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
pivot_min_head_diff_for_activation_degfloat2.0A frame heading difference [deg] smaller than this is not corrected by vehicle pivoting. The steer vector is pivoted instead if that change is big. Small differences are corrected during normal driving.
pivot_target_head_diff_degfloat1.0Target heading difference for ending pivot.
pivot_max_dist_errfloat0.1Maximum allowed distance error to the pivot origin point during pivoting. If the AGV drifts further away a position error is triggered.
pivot_speedfloat0.2Maximum wheel speed during pivot.
pivot_crawl_speedfloat0.1Maximum wheel speed during pivot when close to the target heading.
pivot_crawl_head_diff_degfloat10.0Angular distance from the pivot target heading to activate crawl speed.
pivot_dec_head_degfloat30.0Angular distance from the pivot target heading to ramp pivot speed down to crawl speed.
pivot_traj_calc_stop_h_diff_degfloat10.0Minimum angular difference [deg] between pivot start and end point heading to make a stop for pivoting in trajectory handling. Points with smaller difference are always driven through.
pivot_stop_distance_offsetfloat0.0Defines stopping distance offset from turn points such as pivot and direction change points. Apply negative offset if AGV stops too late.
pivot_max_wheel_diff_ignore_180int0If 1 both right angle and angle +-180 degrees are ok for ending the pivoting.
pivot_with_mode_changeint0If 1 pivoting is done with mode change in PLC.
pivot_over_long_angleint0If 1 pivoting is done over the longer angle, default 0 for short angle.

Docking

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
dist_to_target_enabledint0Distance calculation from AGV to target. Calculates distance from AGV to pallet when AGV is docking, and distance from AGV to unload point when AGV is driving to unload point with a pallet.
dist_to_target_angle_tolerance_degfloat30.0Allowed rotation angle of the pallet with respect to the AGV when distance calculation is enabled.
dist_to_target_max_calc_distfloat4.0Maximum distance from agv to unload point when calculation starts.
docking_to_target_enabledint01 = Enables docking to target. 2 = docking with custom route. If target_detection_type_selection = 0, won't do anything.
docking_with_only_distance_control_enabledint0Enables docking to target with only distance control. docking_to_target_enabled must be 1.
docking_max_start_distancefloat3.5Beyond maximum distance docking won't be triggered.
docking_max_start_anglefloat15.0Maximum angle difference from navigation point to the target compared to tarjectory's end point's heading, when starting to dock [+-degrees fov].
docking_max_start_headingfloat5.0Maximum angle diff for vehicle heading and trajectory's end point heading, when starting to dock [+-degrees fov].
docking_max_dist_error_from_end_pointfloat0.5Maximum distance difference for the stopping point compared to the symbolic point.
docking_max_target_anglefloat15.0Maximum difference between target and end point's headings.
docking_stop_distancefloat0.50Defines how close to the target vehicle tries to drive (calculated from navigation point to target).
docking_y_offsetfloat0.0Offset in y-coordinate for docking (in machine coordinates).
docking_use_route_headingint0Defines how the docking end heading is selected. 0 = Detected heading of the target is used requiring more space for manouvering. 1 = Route heading is used allowing a heading offset to the target. Only used when docking_to_target_enabled = 1.
docking_approach_distfloat1.25After this distance vehicle stops, if the approach error is too big.
docking_approach_max_dist_errfloat0.10If distance error is bigger than this in approach area, vehicle stops.
docking_approach_max_h_err_degfloat5.0If heading error is bigger than this [deg] in approach area, vehicle stops.
docking_allow_maneuverint0If errors are too high on approach, 0 = stop the machine, 1 = try to maneuver back and forward.
docking_small_gains_distfloat0.50The distance before stopping where curvature is limited with docking_limit_curv_on_approach.
docking_limit_corr_distfloat0.50The distance before stopping which is driven only with odometry. Location correction disabled or limited with docking_max_xy_corr and docking_max_h_corr.
docking_small_gainsint1Enables curvature limit that uses docking_limit_curv_on_approach and docking_limit_curv_on_approach_dist.
docking_max_xy_corrfloat0.0001Maximum XY-corrections while approaching target.
docking_max_h_corrfloat0.003Maximum heading corrections [deg] while approaching target.
docking_limit_curv_on_approachfloat0.1Fraction to limit the calculated curvature. For example, 0.1 means that the curvature is 10% from the calculated value.
docking_limit_curv_on_leavefloat0.05Fraction to limit the calculated curvature. For example, 0.05 means that the curvature is 5% from the calculated value. Used only when docking_leave_unload_loc_straight is set to 1.
docking_approach_warning_to_error_timeout_sint-1Defines a time [s] after which the WARNING_TARGET_APPROACH_ERROR activates the ERROR_DOCKING_FAILED. -1 = Never.
docking_activate_when_inside_symbolic_pointint1Defines if the docking is activated when inside a symbolic point that has the docking tag in addition to basic conditions. 0 = Extra condition not used (recommended), 1 = Extra condition used. Has effect only when reflector docking is in use.
docking_limit_drive_vector_angle_change_on_leavefloat0.01Fraction to limit the drive vector angle change when leaving a docking situation. For example, 0.05 means that the drive vector change is 5% from the calculated value. Used only when docking_leave_unload_loc_straight is set to 1.
docking_dist_gainfloat1.0Factor for the position control distance gain when docking. 0 = use pc_pid_dist_p.
docking_heading_gainfloat1.0Factor for the position control heading gain when docking. 0 = use pc_pid_heading_p.
docking_ref_v_sourceint0Speed source when doing docking: 0 = calculated from distance to target, 1 = using route velocity value, 2 = use fixed parameter docking_speed.
docking_speedfloat0.3Speed while docking, if docking_ref_v_source == 2. If it is 0, this is minimum starting speed for the docking drive.
docking_limit_leave_speedfloat0.2Limit speed while driving out from docking location, if docking_limit_leave_speed_and_actuator_height_dist > 0. If it is below 0, speed is not limited.
docking_limit_leave_speed_and_actuator_height_distfloat-1.0Distance from the unload location, where the speed is limited to docking_limit_leave_speed and fork height kept at the measured value. If negative, they are not limited. If enabled, must be smaller than docking_mode_to_fleet_control_dist parameter.
docking_leave_unload_loc_straightint0Enables limit curvature when leaving unload or docking location.
docking_leave_unload_loc_straight_distfloat1.0Limit curvature until this distance from load or unload.
docking_mode_to_fleet_control_distfloat2.5Keep the reported docking mode for fleet control active for this distance after leaving the docking location. The distance is measured from the navigation point position at the end of previous docking to its current position.
docking_notify_approach_distfloat0.50Distance from docking target when a notification is sent to the AGV control.
docking_stopping_point_offset_modeint00 = Use general stopping offsets, 1 = offsets are defined individually for each pallet model with parameters.
docking_follow_route_propertiesint1Use defined properties on the route while creating custom route for docking.
docking_refpoint_max_errfloat-0.5Maximum error [m] for the docking point after started docking. Indicate pushing pallet. If negative, not used.
docking_actuator_height_control_modeint0Defines how lift / fork actuator is controlled in relation to the detected target height during docking. 0 = Disabled, 1 = Direct control. Detected target height is given directly as actuator height reference. 2 = Relative control. Actuator is controlled so that detected height matches value defined by docking_actuator_target_height
docking_actuator_target_heightfloat0.0Defines the desired target height [m] during docking. Actuator is controlled so that height of the detected target mathes this value. Only used when docking_actuator_height_control_mode is set to 2
docking_actuator_height_strict_distfloat0.0Defines a distance [m] from the docking target point within which actuator height must be on the reference or the drive is stopped.
docking_actuator_height_start_distfloat20.0Defines a distance [m] from the docking target point within which the actuator height control is allowed.
docking_control_point_1_dist_from_machinefloat0.20Minimum required distance for the node straight to the AGV heading. The start node is calculated automatically, but if it is closer to the AGV than this paramaeter, an error is set. Used to avoid driving too sharp curves.
docking_control_point_2_dist_from_targetfloat0.80Distance for the node to create straight route before target.
docking_allow_custom_route_updateint00 = custom route is locked after it is created, 1 = custom route is updated if the target changes.
docking_custom_route_min_xy_difffloat0.02Minimum distance difference [m] between the old pallet and the new to update the last part of the custom route. If set to positive, custom route is updated. Also uses target_detection_max_diff_in_xy_results to check that the difference is not too large.
docking_custom_route_min_angle_difffloat2.0Minimum angle difference [deg] between the old pallet and the new to update the last part of the custom route. If set to positive, custom route is updated. Also uses target_detection_max_diff_in_angle_results to check that the difference is not too large.
docking_custom_route_max_allowed_xy_diff_for_targetfloat0.2Maximum limit [m] for the custom route update related to the initial target. The custom route is not updated if the new target is further away than this parameter from the initial target (target location when the custom route is created for the first time).
docking_to_agv_modeint0Defines if the AGV is the docking AGV or the target of docking when docking two AGVs together. 0 = docking AGV, 1 = target.
docking_to_agv_connection_distfloat20.0Defines the distance between docking AGV and target AGV within which a connection is required.

Synchronized driving

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
coupled_drive_enabledint0Enables coupled-driving feature.
coupled_pid_heading_err_pfloat2.0Proportional controller gain for heading error between AGV nominal and reference heading in formation.
coupled_pid_heading_err_ifloat0.0Integral controller gain for heading error between AGV nominal and reference heading in formation.
coupled_pid_lon_dist_err_pfloat2.0Proportional controller gain for longitudinal distance error between AGV nominal and reference position in formation.
coupled_pid_lon_dist_err_ifloat0.0Integral controller gain for longitudinal distance error between AGV nominal and reference position in formation.
coupled_pid_trans_dist_err_pfloat2.0Proportional controller gain for lateral distance error between AGV nominal and reference position in formation.
coupled_pid_trans_dist_err_ifloat0.0Integral controller gain for lateral distance error between AGV nominal and reference position in formation.
coupled_pid_delta_v_limfloat0.2Maximum allowed velocity change from reference due to formation error.
coupled_pid_delta_c_limfloat0.3Maximum allowed curvature change from reference due to formation error.
coupled_max_dist_err_cmfloat3.0Maximum allowed distance error between nominal and current position of AGVs in coupled drive before an error is raised.
coupled_max_head_err_degfloat2.0Maximum allowed heading error between nominal and current position of AGVs in coupled drive before an error is raised.
coupled_max_drive_vfloat0.30Maximum allowed formation velocity [m/s] during coupled drive.
coupled_formation_err_sensoruint0Formation error sensortype: 0 = from Navigation SW positioning, 1 = external sensor, 2 = pattern detection.
coupled_formation_offset_max_read_fail_countuint5Maximum consecutive cycles of missing measurements from formation error sensor before an error is raised.
coupled_formation_err_h_can_enc_idxint-1Index in can_enc_actuator parameter arrays for coupled drive formation heading error CAN sensor.
coupled_formation_err_x_can_enc_idxint-1Index in can_enc_actuator parameter arrays for coupled drive formation longitudinal (x) error sensor.
coupled_formation_err_disable_route_propertystringFormationErrCtrlDisabledRoute property to disable formation error control on specific routes.
coupled_formation_localize_modeint0Formation localization mode: 0 = From AGV position and formation errors, 1 = From Leader and Follower position.
coupled_pid_override_lon_dist_err_cmfloat0.0Coupled drive longitudinal distance error controller will use override gains if error is below this distance.
coupled_pid_override_trans_dist_err_cmfloat0.0Coupled drive transversal distance error controller will use override gains if error is below this distance.
coupled_pid_override_head_err_degfloat0.0Coupled drive heading error controller will use override gains if error is below this limit.
coupled_pid_override_heading_err_pfloat0.0Coupled drive controller gain for heading error control in override control region.
coupled_pid_override_lon_dist_err_pfloat0.0Coupled drive controller gain for longitudinal distance error control in override control region.
coupled_pid_override_trans_dist_err_pfloat0.0Coupled drive controller gain for lateral distance error control in override control region.
coupled_comm_status_update_interval_msint100Interval of periodic status and control updates between coupled AGVs.
coupled_comm_control_ref_timeout_msint200Timeout for control reference from leader AGV.
coupled_comm_loss_stop_timefloat2.0Deceleration time in case of coupled communicaiton loss.
coupled_comm_loss_fstop_timeoutfloat5.0Coupled driving state is changed to FStop if communication between coupled AGVs is lost for more than this period.
coupled_actuator_controlint0Enables coupled drive actuator control feature.
coupled_barrier_stop_signal_max_wait_time_msint3000Maximum wait time from the first AGV stopped signal to the other before error is set and barrier stop aborted.
navicomm_inte_ipstringIP address of Navigation SW IPC for navicomm communication interface.
navicomm_inte_portint1236Port for navicomm communication interface.

Trailer transport

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
trailer_transport_enabledint0Enables trailer transport feature.
trailer_error_timer_msint60000Error timer for trailer (un)coupling operations. If the system does not change to the requested coupling status within this time an error is raised.
trailer_kingpin_approach_max_distfloat1.0The maximum drive distance when approaching kingpin during coupling. An error is set if kingpin is not detected within this distance.
trailer_kingpin_approach_max_vfloat0.2The maximum drive speed when approaching kingpin during coupling.
trailer_uncoupling_straight_leave_distfloat0.5The straight drive distance for leaving kingpin after uncoupling.
trailer_uncoupling_straight_leave_max_vfloat0.2The straight drive maximum velocity for leaving kingpin after uncoupling.
trailer_max_heading_err_close_degfloat7.0Error is set, if trailer angle error is larger than this value and scanner telescope length is less than the distance to frontmost axle.
trailer_max_heading_err_far_degfloat1.5Error is set, if trailer angle error is larger than this value and scanner telescope length is larger than the distance to frontmost axle.
trailer_transport_pid_heading_err_pfloat3.0Controller gain for Trailer-AGV heading error control in trailer transport.

Magnetic line following

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
line_following_sensor_communicationint00 = disabled, 1 = CAN enabled, 2 = Ethernet UDP
line_following_sensor_modelint[]00 = None, 1 = Sick MLS
line_following_sensor_nodeidint[]0CANOpen Node ID. 0 = not defined, 1-127 = valid node ID.
line_following_sensor_pos_xfloat[]0.0The sensor x-position with respect to navigation point (local coordinates).
line_following_sensor_pos_yfloat[]0.0The sensor y-position with respect to navigation point (local coordinates).
line_following_sensor_offset_yfloat[]0.0The y deviation from the nominal sensor position.
line_following_sensor_flippedint[]0The sensor is flipped, the measurements are not in same coordinate system as AGV, measurements rotated 180 degrees.
line_following_max_dist_since_last_measfloat0.1The maximum Euclidean distance the AGV can drive in map coordinates without receiving measurements before giving error.
line_following_swap_bytesint0Swap bytes in line following ethernet interface: 0 = Little endian, 1 = Big endian
line_following_sensor_eth_portint[]5333Port of the device.

Localization

Odometry configuration

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
odo_timing_modeint1Enable automatic odometry timestamp variation correction.
odo_max_interval_msint60Maximum interval between two consecutive odometry data updates [ms].
odo_max_interval_stdev_usint2500Maximum standard deviation of odometry update intervals [us].
odo_use_dsdr_calcint1Use distance and heading mode for odometry calculation. Old ethernet communication protocol.
odo_err_est_alphafloat0.002Positioning error averaging weight, must be higher than odo_auto_corr_alpha_*.
odo_auto_corr_alpha_dhfloat0.000Relative amount of averaged positioning error applied on odometry turning rate correction, must be lower than odo_err_est_alpha, set to 0 to disable, ex. value 0.001.
odo_auto_corr_alpha_dsfloat0.000Relative amount of averaged positioning error applied on odometry distance correction, must be lower than odo_err_est_alpha, set to 0 to disable, ex. value 0.001.
odo_auto_corr_alpha_hfloat0.000Relative amount of averaged positioning error applied on odometry heading correction, must be lower than odo_err_est_alpha, set to 0 to disable, ex. value 0.001.
odo_auto_corr_h_modeint0How odometry heading correction is applied: 0 = to scanner heading(s), 1 = to driving axle heading
odo_auto_corr_max_curv_deg_p_mfloat10.0Maximum curvature [deg/m] for odometry correction to be applied.
odo_auto_corr_max_dherr_degfloat4.0Maximum odometry turning correction amount [deg/m].
odo_auto_corr_max_dserrfloat0.08Maximum odometry distance correction amount, relative amount of travelled distance.
odo_auto_corr_max_herr_degfloat4.0Maximum odometry heading correction amount [deg].
odo_jump_max_speedfloat5.0Speed limit for raw odometry to be detected as invalid [m/s].
odo_jump_max_turn_rate_deg_p_sfloat180.0Turn rate limit for raw odometry to be detected as invalid.
odo_max_extrapolate_msint300Determines the maximum time difference of current pose and the time of scanner measurement which is still accepted to be used for calculating the AGVs pose at the time of scanner measurement.

Position initialization

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
start_pos_ini_enabledint1Enables position initialization on startup. Requires that the vehicle has been stationary since turned off. 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled, 2 = Like mode \
pos_init_max_wait_timeint2000Defines the timeout limit for the position initialization. If the timeout is triggered, the position initialization algorithm will be interrupted.
pos_ini_min_conffloat70.0Position initialization will not be accepted if the position confidence is lower than this threshold.
pos_init_pos_conf_gainfloat0.667This gain defines how quickly the position confidence reacts to changes during position initialization.
require_position_initializationint1Defines what input is required for position initialization: 0 = Position will automatically be initialized if the confidence is high enough but a warning will be raised, 1= External position initialization is required, 2 = Position will automatically be initialized if the confidence is high enough.
pos_ini_max_history_cumdsfloat0.00 = off, default recommended value 1.
pos_ini_max_history_dist_errfloat0.07
pos_ini_max_history_h_deg_errfloat4.0
pos_ini_max_total_dxyfloat0.0Defines the maximum allowed movement from initialization point along both the x-axis and y-axis. Position initialization will stop after this threshold is breached. To avoid any limitation, set this parameter to 0.
pos_ini_max_total_dh_degfloat0.0Defines the maximum allowed heading correction from the heading of the initialization point. Position initialization will stop after this threshold is breached. To avoid any direct limitation, set this parameter to 0.
pos_ini_no_dr_chk_msint0If >0, dead reckoning checks will be disabled during position initialization and for the specified time [ms] after the position has been initialized.
pos_ini_remaining_diff_xyfloat0.011Position initialization will not finish before the position corrections in x and y are below this threshold.
pos_ini_remaining_diff_hfloat0.5Position initialization will not finish before the heading corrections are below this threshold.
pos_ini_min_reflectors_seenint0Minimum number of reflectors required to be seen when initializing position.
pos_ini_max_reflector_pos_errfloat0.05Maximum deviation [m] in the reflector position compared to its taught map position for it to be counted as valid during position initialization.
pos_ini_refl_check_enableint0If enabled, the navigation software tracks the reflectors after position initialization.
pos_ini_min_refl_seen_while_drivingint2Defines the minimum number of reflectors to be seen at least once while driving. Active during reflector tracking after position initialization.
pos_ini_max_dist_refl_seen_while_drivingfloat10.0Defines the upper threshold to the driving distance [m] during tracking. The tracking process must succeed within this distance.
pos_ini_min_dist_refl_seen_while_drivingfloat1.0Minimum distance specified [m] for vehicle to decide if it has seen pos_ini_conf_min_refl_seen number of reflectors otherwise set posInitDone to 0
pos_ini_refl_based_enableint0Enables position initialisation based on reflector triangulation.
pos_ini_refl_based_co_dist_reflfloat20.0Reflector-based position initialization - Distance (cutoff) between the reflectors to consider determining angles between them.
pos_ini_refl_dist_match_epsfloat0.1Maximum distance difference between distances of the map reflectors vs the measured reflectors for automatic position initialization.
pos_ini_refl_ang_match_epsfloat1.0Maximum angle difference [deg] between the observed angle and the calculated angle created at a particular reflector point by vectors joing any other two reflectors.
pos_ini_refl_min_allowed_angfloat1.0Minimum allowed angle formed by 3 reflectors for reflector-based position initialization.
pos_ini_refl_max_allowed_angfloat179.0Max allowed angle formed by 3 reflectors for reflector-based position initialization.
pos_ini_refl_auto_repos_enint0Enables automatic position initialization based on reflectors when AGV has lost position.
pos_ini_refl_try_countint10Max number of attempts to initialize position via reflector matching algorithm; by any position initialization this counter will be reset. (max value: 1000)
pos_ini_refl_number_setsint10Number of reflector sets to be formed from the reflectors seen by the scanner. Modify this to reduce the time taken by algorithm and also the computational cost.
pos_ini_refl_matching_interval_msint1000Time interval (in milliseconds) between two consecutive position initialization attempts.
pos_ini_refl_min_conffloat70.0Automatic reflector position initialization should not be triggered if position confidence is above this threshold.
pos_init_xyh_min_gainfloat0.2Defines a minimum map confidence gain for scaling the amount of applied heading correction when initializing position.
start_info_save_interval_secsint30Save interval [s] of startinfo file at run time. 0 = disable saving at run time
start_info_save_stopped_time_secsint5Save startinfo file after specified time [s] after AGV has stopped. Note that start_info_save_interval_secs = 0 disables also this saving.
start_pos_ini_max_dist_errfloat0.06Defines the maximum deviation between a live scanner point and its value stored in the start info for it to be considered as matching during position initialization from start info.
start_pos_ini_min_match_ratefloat0.5Defines how large the fraction of scanners points matching the data stored in the start info should be for position initialization to go through.
start_pos_ini_ext_loc_xy_errfloat0.1Maximum external localization xy err for start position initialization.
start_pos_ini_ext_loc_h_err_degfloat2.0Maximum external localization heading err for start position initialization.

Positioning

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
loc_corr_onedir_in_useint0Enables one dimensional corrections and weight dampening in one-dimensional environments. Used in environments such as corridors, where the natural features are only seen along one direction.
loc_xy_max_corrfloat0.01Sets an upper threshold to the position corrections in the xy-plane. Position corrections larger than this are limited to the specified value.
loc_h_max_corrfloat0.3Sets an upper threshold to the heading corrections. Heading corrections larger than this are limited to the specified value [deg].
loc_corr_when_stationaryint10 = position is not corrected when odometry indicates that the vehicle is stationary, 1 = position is corrected at all times.
loc_cum_xy_corr_warnfloat0.0If larger than 0.0f, this sets an upper threshold to the cumulative position corrections in the xy-plane per driven meter. If the limit is exceeded, WARNING_LARGE_CUM_XY_CORRECTION is set.
loc_cum_h_corr_warnfloat0.0If larger than 0.0f, this sets an upper threshold to the cumulative heading correction per driven meter. If the limit is exceeded, WARNING_LARGE_CUM_HEADING_CORRECTION is set.(degrees)
loc_slip_det_max_dir_diff_degfloat360.0Maximum difference between slipping direction and machine heading.
loc_slip_det_speed_limfloat0.1Maximum speed for slip detection to ignore speed and direction difference limits.
loc_slip_det_small_xy_corrfloat0.0Minimum xy correction to be detected as small slipping: 0 = disabled
loc_slip_det_large_xy_corrfloat0.0Minimum xy correction to be detected as large slipping: 0 = disabled
loc_slip_det_large_h_corr_degfloat0.0Minimum h correction to be detected as large slipping: 0 = disabled
loc_slip_det_small_v_dropfloat0.40Minimum velocity drop to trigger position correction for small xy slip: 0.0 = always enabled
loc_odo_v_drop_alphafloat0.1Odometry speed averaging gain.
loc_slip_det_corr_apply_modeint0Correction mode for slip detection: 0 = apply both h and xy correction completely, 1 = apply only h correction completely, 2 = apply only xy correction completely
loc_slip_det_xy_corr_limitfloat1.0How much xy correction is allowed when slipping.
loc_slip_det_xy_corr_increase_per_cyclefloat0.10The increase in maximum xy correction in each cycle when wheel slip is detected.
loc_slip_det_h_corr_increase_per_cycle_degfloat1.0The increase in maximum h correction in each cycle when wheel slip is detected [deg].
corr_refl_conf_newint0
corr_refl_conf_max_dist_errfloat0.1Sets an upper threshold to the distance deviation for a single reflector for the position confidence calculation. Only used in the corr_refl_conf_new mode.
corr_refl_conf_min_dist_errfloat0.01Sets a lower threshold to the distance deviation for a single reflector for the position confidence calculation. Only used in the corr_refl_conf_new mode.
corr_refl_conf_max_ang_err_degfloat1.0Sets an upper threshold to the heading deviation for a single reflector for the position confidence calculation. Only used in the corr_refl_conf_new mode.
corr_refl_conf_min_ang_err_degfloat0.02Sets a lower threshold to the heading deviation for a single reflector for the position confidence calculation. Only used in the corr_refl_conf_new mode.
loc_xy_max_corr_ini_posfloat0.05Defines an upper threshold to the position corrections in xy-plane during position initialization.
loc_h_max_corr_ini_posfloat4.0Defines an upper threshold to the heading corrections during position initialization.
loc_xy_max_corr_monitor_ini_posfloat0.01Defines an upper threshold to the position corrections in the xy-plane during position initialization triggered by Monitor.
loc_h_max_corr_monitor_ini_posfloat1.0Defines an upper threshold to the heading corrections during position initialization triggered by Monitor.
teach_file_formatint5Saved teach file format version: 1 = old format, 2 = new format released with new segment files (1.0.9.6), 3 = new format with high resolution reflector data (Tools 2.01), 4 = support for array parameters (Tools 2.20), 5 = support for external localization (Tools 2.5X)
map_cell_widthfloat0.2Square cell side length for calculating map table indices from xy.
map_area_cell_width_multiplierint5map_cell_width * value
corr_peak_edge_distfloat0.1Sets the upper threshold for the peak edge distance which is used when calculating the peak edge scale for the position confidence. If the peak edge distance is larger than this, the peak edge scale is set to 0.
corr_other_peak_min_distfloat0.05
corr_peak_edge_ratiofloat0.98Defines the ratio of the peak that has to be within a certain distance when calculating the peak edge scale.
corr_scan_max_weight_distfloat8.0Sets an upper limit to weight a single scanner point based on distance.
corr_scan_min_distfloat0.5
corr_resolutionfloat0.02Defines the resolution used in positioning.
corr_rangefloat0.26Defines the range where new position is searched from. Only position corrections within this distance are considered.
corr_table_pad_modeint1Defines how padding is applied. 0 = no padding, 1 = min padding, 2 = avg padding.
corr_range_ini_posfloat1.0Defines the range where new position is searched from during position initialization. Only position corrections within this distance are considered.
corr_blur_radiusfloat2.5
corr_xyh_pol_resolutionfloat0.25Defines the heading correction resolution [deg].
corr_pol_rangefloat5.0Defines the allowed range for heading corrections [deg].
corr_pol_range_ini_posfloat20.0Defines the allowed range for heading correction [deg] when initializing position.
corr_refl_pol_blur_radiusfloat5.0
corr_pol_max_drfloat0.025
corr_pol_max_pt_distfloat0.3
corr_pol_peak_min_valfloat0.0
corr_pol_max_peak_ratiofloat0.9
corr_refl_pol_new_mode_max_distfloat1.5Maximum distance between rotation center and AGV position to use rotation center.
corr_refl_pol_new_mode_refl_min_distfloat3.0At least two reflectors must be further than min distance from each other to use new mode.
corr_refl_pol_new_mode_nav_point_weightfloat0.30Weight of navigation point in calculation of polar rotation point.
corr_refl_pol_new_mode_use_alwaysint1
corr_refl_pol_min_dist_from_rot_axisfloat0.0Minimum distance between reflector and rotation axis.
loc_refl_dist_corrfloat0.025
loc_refl_point_sel_distfloat0.5Maximum distance between seen and map position to match the reflector.
loc_refl_max_dist_difffloat0.1Maximum distance to reflector difference between two sequential beams.
loc_refl_tot_dist_errfloat0.55Cumulative distance errors for all reflectors seen.
loc_refl_max_angle_corrfloat5.0Maximum angle difference between map and seen angles in reflector pair.
loc_refl_min_detected_amountint2Minimum number of detected reflectors to be used in localization.
loc_refl_single_min_distfloat2.0Minimum distance to use the reflector in case of single reflectors seen.
loc_refl_pos_filter_amountfloat0.8Coefficient for filtering reflectors points to a cluster.
corr_h_map_weight_conf_scale_limitfloat50.0Parameter is used to calculate a weight between the heading correction results from map and reflectors. [%]
corr_h_map_max_weight_conffloat90.0Reflectors are not used for heading correction if map confidence is higher than this limit [%].
corr_h_map_min_weight_conffloat80.0Defines a lower threshold for scaling the weight for the applied heading correction based on the map and reflectors. [%]
loc_refl_h_corr_base_weightfloat5000.0Base weight for reflector points.
loc_refl_h_corr_dist_weightfloat100.0Gain for distance related weight for reflector points.
loc_refl_h_corr_dr_weightint1Enables reflector weight calculation based on radial distance between map reflector position and actual position.
loc_refl_pos_filter_min_nptsint4Maximum number of scanner points forming a reflector cluster. Affects on accuracy of distance to reflector measurement.
loc_same_sign_gainfloat2.0
loc_same_single_reflector_distfloat0.2The position difference between a single reflector as seen by the scanner and on the map.
corr_pol_peak_edge_dist_degfloat1.5Defines the edge of the highest peak. The peak must be narrow enough to use the corresponding heading correction.
corr_peak_edge_min_distfloat0.04Sets the lower threshold for the peak edge distance which is used when calculating the peak edge scale for the position confidence. If the peak edge distance is smaller than this, the peak edge scale is set to 1.
corr_refl_max_dist_errfloat0.03Maximum distance error for reflector measurements.
corr_refl_max_ang_err_degfloat2.0Angle error of reflector measurements
corr_refl_single_max_ang_err_multiplierfloat1.0Multiplier for angle error of reflector measurements when only one is seen, recommended value at least 2.
corr_refl_pos_ini_max_ang_err_degfloat2.0Maximum angle error for reflector measurements for position initialization.
corr_refl_weightfloat1.0Gain that sets the relation in weight between the reflector points and regular environment points in case if multiple reflectors are seen.
corr_refl_weight_singlefloat1.0Gain that sets the relation in weight between the reflector points and regular scanner points in case if single reflector is seen.
loc_refl_dist_penaltyfloat1.0
corr_refl_conf_distfloat0.02Gain for reflector position confidence. Should be increased to increase reflector position confidence. Used only when corr_refl_conf_new is set to 0.
corr_refl_dist_errfloat0.01Addition to the total error of reflector distance error. Should be decreased to increase reflector position confidence. Used only when corr_refl_conf_new is set to 0.
loc_onedir_max_errfloat0.02Determines a threshold for the estimated error of the 1D LSQ fit. One-dimensional corrections will not be applied if the error exceeds this value.
loc_onedir_min_scalefloat0.2This defines a threshold for the peak-edge-scale. One-dimensional corrections will not be applied if the peak-edge-scale exceeds this value.
loc_onedir_new_scalefloat0.3If one-dimensional corrections are applied, this is the peak-edge-scale.
corr_1d_ang_max_errfloat0.03Determines a threshold for the estimated error of the 1D LSQ fit. 1D weight dampening will not be applied if the error exceeds this value.
corr_1d_max_portionfloat0.5Determines how large ratio of the weight are originating from points classified as one-dimensional.
corr_1d_min_pt_weightfloat0.025Sets a lower limit to the weight for individual points classified as one-dimensional. Points with lower weights will be limited to this value.
corr_1d_max_pt_weightfloat0.5Sets an upper limit to the weight for individual points classified as one-dimensional. Points with higher weights will be limited to this value.
corr_1d_damping_pt_dirv_min_rnint3Defines the minimum number of neighboring points on each side during the weight scale calculation for the weight dampening of points considered to be one-dimensional.
corr_1d_damping_pt_dirv_min_rfloat0.1Defines the minimum distance on each side for which the points closer than this should be checked during the weight scale calculation for the weight dampening of points considered to be one-dimensional.
corr_1d_damping_pt_dirv_min_errfloat0.02Defines the lower threshold for the error during the 1D weight dampening calculation. Errors smaller than this give an initial scale of 0.
corr_1d_damping_pt_dirv_max_errfloat0.06Defines the upper threshold for the error during the 1D weight dampening calculation. Errors larger than this give an initial scale of 1.
corr_1d_damping_mask_ratiofloat0.5During the 1D weight dampening process, this ratio defines the masking threshold used to filter out unwanted points.
loc_use_points_inside_frameint0Enable the use of scanner points inside vehicle frame.
corr_xyh_resolutionfloat0.02Defines the resolution for heading corrections.
corr_xyh_table_radiusint7
corr_xyh_blur_radiusfloat1.5
corr_xyh_pol_blur_radiusfloat0.0
corr_xyh_pol_interpint1
corr_xyh_max_n_groupsint100
corr_xyh_div_search_start_intervalint1
corr_xyh_max_rangefloat0.26Defines the range where new position is searched from. Usage is for heading corrections.
corr_xyh_group_resolutionfloat0.02
localize_sleep_time_usint1000Time [ms] how long localize is forced to sleep after each position correction cycle.

Reflector positioning

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
reflector_rssi_min_ratiofloat0.85RSSI ratio for reflector detection: Omron 0.85, Sick & Pef 0.75, Hokuyo 0.50, Leuze 0.80
min_reflectors_seenint0Sets an error if number of reflectors seen is less this parameter value. 0 = disabled
loc_reflector_max_ind_diffint3Maximum index difference between two reflectors.
loc_reflector_min_distfloat0.1Minimum distance to use the reflector in case of multiple reflectors seen.
loc_reflector_max_distfloat15.0Maximum distance [m] to use the reflector.
loc_reflector_pair_match_distfloat0.07Maximum distance error for two reflectors between map and scanner positions to create a pair.
loc_reflector_filter_duplicatesint1Filters away duplicate reflectors.
use_single_reflector_without_pair_matchingint1Defines if a single reflector may be used for position correction: 0 = do not correct the position based on a single reflector, 1 = correct the position based on a single reflector.
refl_max_dist_from_linefloat0.05Maximum deviation from line for discarding a reflector detection from the reflector pattern.
refl_discard_undersizedint01 to discard undersized reflector detections from the reflector pattern.
refl_height_detection_gap_reflector_angle_degfloat45.0The angle A of the gap reflector CCW from vertical, gives the gap width W between the triangles as W = reflW / cos(A)
refl_height_detection_gap_reflector_widthfloat0.050The width W of the vertical reflectors and the gap angle A from vertical, gives the gap reflector width reflW = W * cos(A)
refl_height_detection_gap_reflector_indexint2Index of the gap reflector in the reflector pattern, preferably two vertical reflectors on each side to ensure correct pattern detection despite disturbances
refl_height_detection_reflector_heightfloat0.4The height of the vertical reflectors and the vertical height of the gap angle reflector. Gives the range of use in height detection. The height detection zero point is in the low end of the reflectors.
refl_height_detection_pattern_height_offsetfloat0.0The height offset between the low end of the reflector pattern and the ground or the reference plane on a vehicle. Positive distance when pattern above the reference level, else negative.
refl_height_detection_scanner_height_offsetfloat0.0The height offset between the scanner and the reference plane on a vehicle. Positive distance when scanner above the reference level, else negative.

Position confidence

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
pos_conf_limitfloat25.0Defines the minimum position confidence for the machine to be able to operate.
pos_conf_gainfloat0.9This gain defines how quickly the reported position confidence reacts to the drop of confidence.
pos_conf_odo_dist_scalefloat0.0Traveled distance for which a change in the calculated xy-confidence will gradually be applied over. 0 = disable distance-based position confidence gradient. > 0 to set the distance.
corr_conf_dte_use_peakint0Defines whether the position confidence is based on the dte correlation peak which corresponds to the corrected position of the vehicle. If not activated, confidence is based on the current position of the vehicle. 0 = use the current vehicle position, 1 = use the peak.
corr_conf_min_dist_to_envfloat0.01Sets the lower threshold for the median value of the distance to environment when calculating the dte scale for the position confidence. If the median value is lower than this, the scale is set to 1.
corr_conf_max_dist_to_envfloat0.05Sets the upper threshold for the median value of the distance to environment when calculating the dte scale for the position confidence. If the median value is larger than this, the scale is set to 0.
corr_conf_dte_hist_portionfloat0.5Defines where in the dte histogram we get the value that we base the dte scaling on.
corr_conf_dte_hist_max_distfloat0.1Defines the distance threshold for a point to be considered as matching the environment during the dte calculation. If a point is closer to the environment than this limit, it is considered as matching.
corr_conf_min_scale_nptsint50This defines the lower threshold for the number of points that has to match the environment. If this is not reached, the confidence will be zero.
corr_conf_max_scale_nptsint150This defines the upper threshold for the number of points that are matching to the environment. The confidence is scaled linearly between corr_conf_min_scale_npts and this value for which the confidence will reach its highest level.
corr_conf_min_scale_npts_overrideint0Override value for corr_conf_min_scale_npts. 0 = disabled, > 0 = override value. Activated by scanner_meas_loc_override_level.
corr_conf_max_scale_npts_overrideint0Override value for corr_conf_max_scale_npts. 0 = disabled, > 0 = override value. Activated by scanner_meas_loc_override_level.
corr_conf_dist_scale_slopefloat40.0Defines how the dte scale for position confidence is formed based on the median value of the distance to environment.
corr_conf_max_dist_ramp_areafloat10.0Traveled distance for which a drop in the calculated xy-confidence will be gradually applied over while inside a ramp area. 0 = disable distance-based position confidence gradient. >0 to set the distance.
corr_conf_single_dim_max_distfloat15.0Max. odometry distance since last update.
corr_conf_dyn_map_lite_max_distfloat10.0Travelled distance for which a change in the calculated xy-confidence will gradually be applied over.
corr_conf_decrease_alpha_min_speedfloat0.0Minimum limit for position confidence decrease rate. Assume that at least this distance has been travelled between scanner measurements [m].
corr_conf_precision_max_distfloat5.0Filters position confidence based on travelled distance in precision positioning zone. It takes roughly the parameter amount to fully apply the new confidence value.
corr_conf_precision_no_match_max_distfloat0.1Filters position confidence based on travelled distance in precision positioning zone (no match to environment). It takes roughly the parameter amount to fully apply the new confidence value.

Sensor fusion

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
sf_use_sensor_fusionint0Enables sensor fusion.

sf_state_thz_std_extra_degfloat0.100Extra standard deviation for yaw state for Q matrix.

sf_laser_y_stdfloat0.0010Standard deviation of y of laser R matrix [m].
sf_laser_h_std_degfloat0.0500Standard deviation of h of laser R matrix [deg].

sf_extloc_y_stdfloat0.0001Standard deviation of y of external loc R matrix [m].
sf_extloc_h_std_degfloat0.0010Standard deviation of h of external loc R matrix [deg].
sf_abspos_onlyint0If set to 1, only sensors in sf_abspos_source_arr will be used for localization.
sf_abspos_source_arrint[]-1Type of external localization source: 0 = none, 1 = GPS, 2 = DMC, 3 = ROS based localization
sf_abspos_x_std_arrfloat[]0.0001Standard deviation of x of external loc R matrix [m].
sf_abspos_y_std_arrfloat[]0.0001Standard deviation of y of external loc R matrix [m].

sf_abspos_xy_max_corr_arrfloat[]0.01Maximum xy correction per cycle by selected sensor [m]. Only used if corresponding sf_extloc_limit_corr_arr is 1.
sf_abspos_max_time_since_valid_meas_ms_arrint[]100The maximum time [ms] since last valid absolute positioning measurement.
sf_abspos_max_time_since_valid_conf_ms_arrint[]1500The maximum time [ms] since last valid absolute positioning measurement confidence.
sf_abspos_max_position_deviationfloat0.15The maximum position deviation (x,y) between current and new absolute positioning pose.
sf_abspos_max_angle_deviation_degfloat5.0The maximum angular deviation [deg] between current and new absolute positioning pose.
sf_gps_x_stdfloat0.0010Standard deviation of x of gps loc R matrix [m].
sf_gps_y_stdfloat0.0010Standard deviation of y of gps loc R matrix [m].
sf_gps_h_std_degfloat0.1000Standard deviation of h of gps loc R matrix [m].
sf_gps_limit_corrint0Limits the filter of the maximum gps correction in each cycle.
sf_gps_h_max_corr_degfloat0.3Maximum heading correction per cycle by gps [deg]. Recommended to have same value as loc_h_max_corr_deg. Only used if sf_gps_limit_corr is 1.
sf_gps_xy_max_corrfloat0.01Maximum xy correction per cycle by gps [m]. Only used if sf_gps_limit_corr is 1.
sf_odom_vx_stdfloat0.0050Standard deviation of Vx of odom R matrix.
sf_odom_vy_stdfloat0.0050Standard deviation of Vy of odom R matrix.
sf_odom_wz_std_degfloat0.5000Standard deviation of Wz of odom R matrix.
sf_imu_ax_stdfloat0.1000Standard deviation of ax of imu R matrix.
sf_imu_ay_stdfloat0.1000Standard deviation of ay of imu R matrix.
sf_imu_az_stdfloat0.1000Standard deviation of az of imu R matrix.
sf_imu_wx_std_degfloat0.3300Standard deviation of wx of imu R matrix.
sf_imu_wy_std_degfloat0.3300Standard deviation of wy of imu R matrix.
sf_imu_wz_std_degfloat0.3300Standard deviation of wz of imu R matrix.
sf_imu_roll_degfloat10.000Standard deviation of roll measurement of imu R matrix. Very noisy, and only used in mode 3.
sf_imu_pitch_degfloat10.000Standard deviation of pitch measurement of imu R matrix. Very noisy, and only used in mode 3.
sf_imu_modeint0IMU usage mode: 0 = Dont use, 1 = Only gyro, 2 = Gyro and acc without tilt estimation, 3 = 3D gyro and acc with instantenous tilt measurements, 4 = 3D gyro and acc
sf_full_ekfint1Defines if derivatives are used with respect to angles.
sf_laser_quality_modeint1Choose mode of laser quality: 0 = Disregard laser quality, 1 = Apply quality scale to x and y, 2 = Apply quality scale to x, y heading
sf_laser_quality_maxfloat0.70Laser quality above this will be treated as full quality. Between 0.01 and 1.
sf_laser_quality_scaleint10How much quality should affect the filtering. Between 10 and 100.
sf_imu_placement_compint1Defines, if centrifugal acceleration on IMU around navigation point should be compensated.
sf_imu_centri_full_ekfint1Defines if derivatives are used with wrt angles for centrifugal compensation.
sf_conf_max_distfloat50.0The maximum traveled distance where xy pos conf drop will be fully reported.
sf_linear_acc_comp_for_tiltint0Defines if IMU mode 3 should compensate for linear accelerations when calculating tilt. Not recommend to use for inclined environments.
sf_stop_stationary_imuint0Defines if IMU updates stop when on standby outside of environment.
sf_gyro_bias_modeint0Mode of estimating gyroscope bias: 0 = With filter, 1 = With filter and recalibrate when stationary, 2 = Only recalibration when stationary
sf_loc_at_standstill_enabledint1The sensor fusion localization is active at standstill.
sf_gyro_max_turnrate_recalib_deg_per_sfloat0.5The maximum gyroscope turnrate degrees per second to recalibrate bias.
sf_stationary_max_speed_m_per_sfloat0.01The maximum odometry speed m/s to define AGV being stationary.
sf_stationary_max_turnrate_deg_per_sfloat0.5The maximum odometry turnrate degrees/s to define AGV being stationary.
sf_imu_mounting_x_angle_degfloat0.000IMU installation angle around vehicle x axis [deg].
sf_imu_mounting_y_angle_degfloat0.000IMU installation angle around vehicle y axis [deg].
sf_imu_mounting_z_angle_degfloat0.000IMU installation angle around vehicle z axis [deg].
sf_imu_mounting_x_posfloat0.000IMU installation position in x axis.
sf_imu_mounting_y_posfloat0.000IMU installation position in y axis.
sf_imu_mounting_z_posfloat0.000IMU installation position in z axis.
imu_typeint00 = no IMU, 1 = LPMS-CU2/URS2 USB, 2 = LPMS-URS2 serial, 3 = LPMS-CU2 CANOpen, 4 = LPMS IG1 USB, 5 = LPMS IG1 CANOpen, 6 = LPMS-CU3/URS3 USB, 7 = LPMS-CU3 CANOpen, 8 = LPMS-URS3 serial
imu_lpms_data_sizeint0LPMS USB/serial data element size: 0 = 16 bit data, 1 = 32 bit data. This parameter is only valid for CU2 and URS2.
imu_serial_portstring/dev/ttyS0Serial port to be used for IMU communication
imu_idint1ID number of the IMU. If it is a CAN type IMU, then this is the node I. Valid range is from 1 to 127.
imu_dh_useint0Use IMU for dead reckoning: 0 = never use imu, 1 = use imu dh as is, 2 = use combination
imu_deg_p_sec_diff_maxfloat1000.0IMU angular speed max diff when compared to Deadreck dh, if greater use IMU only. Only relevant if imu_dh_use is 2.
imu_deg_p_sec_lofloat1000.0IMU angular speed low limit. Only relevant if imu_dh_use is 2.
imu_deg_p_sec_hifloat1000.0IMU angular speed hihg limit. Only relevant if imu_dh_use is 2.
imu_gain_lofloat0.0IMU gain at low limit.
imu_gain_hifloat0.0IMU gain at high limit.
imu_disable_after_in_standstill_msint0Disable IMU usage after given time [ms] standing still. 0 = never disable based on movement.
imu_max_timeout_msint100Maximum time [ms] without IMU data for error to be raised.
gps_receiver_typeint0GPS receiver to be used in localization: 0 = Disable GPS based localization, 1 = Septentrio AsterXProDirect
gps_teach_enabledint0Enables the GPS data for teach files.
gps_teach_interval_msint5000Save GPS poses with this interval when teaching.
gps_data_typeint1Type of GPS data to use in localization: 0 = Common GGA and HDT, 1 = Septentrio RBP and HRP
gps_receiver_ipstring192.168.10.223IP address of the GPS receiver.
gps_receiver_portint600Ethernet port number of GPS receiver.
gps_simulateint0Simulate the GPS data for testing.
gps_initialize_posionint0Enables automatic position initialization from GPS.
gps_init_pos_cont_percentagefloat90.0The position confidence assigned when position is initialized with gps measurement.
gps_base_station_pos_xfloat0.000X position of the base station in the map.
gps_base_station_pos_yfloat0.000Y position of the base station in the map.
gps_main_antenna_offset_xfloat0.000X position of antenna in the vehicle frame.
gps_main_antenna_offset_yfloat0.000Y position of antenna in the vehicle frame.
gps_main_antenna_offset_zfloat0.000Z position of antenna in the vehicle frame.
gps_disable_laser_corrint0Disable laser updates in sensor fusion when gps fix is available: 0 = Apply laser corrections, 1 = Prevent laser corrections
gps_disabled_area_modeint0How GPS behaves in the GPS disabled areas: 0 = Completely disable GPS, 1 = Use GPS position but not heading

Precision positioning

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
precision_positioning_enableint0Enables precision positioning feature.
precision_positioning_in_pos_init_enabledint0Enables precision positioning areas when initializing position.
precision_pos_corr_blur_radiusfloat2.5Correlation blur radius for precision positioning: 0.0f to disable, recommended value 2.5.
precision_map_max_dist_mfloat0.2Maximum distance offset of the vehicle navigation point in meters when driving into or out of a precision positioning area and switching from positioning between only the environment within the area and the environment outside of it. Recommended start value 0.2.
precision_map_max_hdiff_degfloat30.0Maximum heading offset of the vehicle in degrees when driving into or out of a precision positioning area and switching from positioning between only the environment within the area and the environment outside of it. Recommended start value 30.
precision_min_point_distfloat0.02Minimum distance in meters between precision positioning points generated from the environment within the precision positioning area. Recommended start value 0.02.
precision_reflectors_onlyint0Defines to use only reflectors within precision positioning areas.
precision_refl_conf_multiplierfloat2.0Multiplier for position confidence gained by detected reflectors. Recommended start value 2.
precision_refl_max_dist_errfloat0.2Maximum position error [m] for the reflector to be considered.
precision_refl_max_ang_err_degfloat2.0Maximum angular error [deg] for the reflector to be considered.
precision_large_xyfloat0.01If the xy-correction residual is larger than the parameter value, the maximum xy-correction is limited to precision_xy_corr_large, otherwise precision_xy_corr_small. Valid inside the precision positioning zones.
precision_large_hfloat0.1If the h-correction residual is larger than the parameter value, the maximum h-correction is limited to precision_h_corr_large, otherwise precision_h_corr_small. Valid inside the precision positioning zones.
precision_xy_corr_largefloat0.001Maximum larger distance (XY) precision correction limit.
precision_xy_corr_smallfloat0.0003Maximum smaller distance (XY) precision correction limit.
precision_h_corr_largefloat0.05Maximum larger heading correction limit.
precision_h_corr_smallfloat0.01Maximum smaller heading correction limit.
precision_positioning_enable_optional_parametersint0If set to 1, enables optional parameter file, when driving inside a precision positioning area.

Dynamic mapping

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
dyn_map_lite_pos_corrint1Enables position correction based on dynamic mapping lite.
dyn_map_lite_n_measint0Determines how many measurements to keep in dynamic map lite. Has to be >0 for dynamic mapping to be enabled. Recommended value 50.
dyn_map_lite_only_on_autoint01 to only update dynamic map when auto driving, 0 for all driving.
dyn_map_lite_resolutionfloat0.02Resolution of dynamic mapping points. Points closer than this distance [m] are merged together. Recommended value 0.02.
dyn_map_lite_meas_interval_mfloat0.05Minimum distance between measurements added to map.
dyn_map_lite_meas_interval_degfloat10.0Minimum heading difference between measurements added to map.
dyn_map_lite_update_max_hcorr_degfloat0.5Dynamic map is not updated if the heading was corrected more than this limit.
dyn_map_lite_update_max_xycorrfloat0.04Dynamic map is not updated if position was corrected more than this limit.
dyn_map_lite_remove_cum_hcorr_degfloat0.0Dynamic map measurements are removed if the cumulative heading correction exceeds this limit. 0 to disable, 5.0 recommended.
dyn_map_lite_remove_cum_xycorrfloat0.0Dynamic map measurements are removed if the cumulative heading correction exceeds this limit. 0 to disable, 0.1 recommended.
dyn_map_lite_update_min_env_conffloat0.0Minimum position confidence [%] to update dynamic map. 0-100 %
dyn_map_lite_pt_weightfloat0.002Multiplier for the weights of points added by dynamic mapping lite.
dyn_map_lite_wait_dist_after_pos_lostfloat0.2Distance required to travel after position had been lost before starting to update dynamic map.
dyn_map_lite_conf_pt_distfloat0.05The distance at which dynamic mapping points are included for position confidence calculation.
dyn_map_lite_conf_min_base_conffloat75.0Minimum limit for base confidence calculated from laser measurement distance to known environment. When dynamic mapping is in use the base confidence doesn't go below this for the purposes of correction gain calculation. 0-100 %
dyn_map_lite_conf_gainfloat0.05Lowpass filter gain for dynamic mapping lite based position confidence.
dyn_map_lite_conf_max_drop_ratefloat0.7The detection limit for dynamic map position confidence drop that would trigger Navitrol to stop trusting the dynamic map. Relative to the current confidence level.
dyn_map_lite_excluded_areasint01 to use dynamic mapping excluded areas and not add points within them, 0 to disable.
dyn_map_pt_min_weight_loggedfloat0.05Minimum weight for dynamic mapping points to be written to log or sent to Monitor. Recommended 0.0 - 0.2
dyn_map_lite_make_xy_corrsint0Enables daynamic mapping to do xy corrections outside of static environment.
dyn_map_lite_pos_init_modeint00 disable position initializing from dynamic mapping, 1 initialize position and restore confidence if AGV's surrounding has not been changed significantly.
dyn_map_lite_pos_init_weightfloat0.03Weight of dynamic mapping points added during position initialization.
dyn_map_server_enableint0Enables dynamic mapping server.
dyn_map_server_ipstringThe IP address that the dynamic mapping server is listening on.
dyn_map_server_portint6089The TCP port that the dynamic mapping server is listening on.
dyn_map_server_update_interval_msint500How often to send an update to the dynamic mapping server.
dyn_map_server_update_min_n_new_measint20Only send measurment data when there are at least this many new measurements.
dyn_map_update_process_time_margin_msint5Dynamic map updates are processed per localize cycle until time until next scanner update is less than this.
dyn_map_update_process_min_time_msint2Dynamic map updates are processed at least until this time has passed.
dyn_map_pt_weight_resolutionfloat0.00001Points are removed from the map when their weight is less than this limit.
dyn_map_server_max_disappeared_point_distfloat0.0Maximum distance for detecting disappeared server points, 0 to disable.
dyn_map_server_disappeared_point_ang_margin_degfloat2.0For a point to be detected as disappeared, all scanner beams within +- this value need to pass through the point.
dyn_map_server_disappeared_point_dist_marginfloat0.1For a scanner beam to be defined as having passed through a point, the beam has to travel further than this distance away from the point.
dyn_map_server_disappeared_point_min_n_seen_throughint20Number of laser scans required to have seen through a point for the point to be marked as disappeared.
dyn_map_server_recv_timeout_msint5000Connection is detected as broken if no data is received within this time.
dyn_map_update_enableint0
dyn_map_min_point_distfloat0.005Only add the points to table map if they are further than this from an existing point.
dyn_map_same_point_dfloat0.03
dyn_map_update_min_conf_inifloat80.0Position confidence must be above this limit to start updating the map.
dyn_map_update_min_conffloat60.0Position confidence must be above this limit to update the map if the map has been updated before.
dyn_map_update_base_weight_upfloat0.03
dyn_map_update_ini_weight_upfloat0.90
dyn_map_update_base_weight_downfloat0.03
dyn_map_point_del_weightfloat0.10
dyn_map_dist_front_objectfloat0.03
dyn_map_min_dist_to_pointfloat0.05
dyn_map_min_scan_distfloat0.50
dyn_map_min_dist_to_staticfloat0.30
dyn_map_close_to_staticfloat0.10
dyn_map_ldist_to_update_dynfloat0.03
dyn_map_dist_to_update_dynfloat0.10
dyn_map_x_marginfloat10.0Margin to add to the map size for dynamic points.
dyn_map_y_marginfloat10.0Margin to add to the map size for dynamic points.

Drive control

Drive control

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
creeping_speed_limit_for_zeroingfloat0.00005Prevent position creeping by zeroing flickering odometer dS value below parameter (currently only omni), 0 = no action.
min_slow_down_speedfloat0.1Speed [m/s] for slowdown when approaching the end of the trajectory.
slow_down_crawl_distfloat0.1Distance [m] from trajectory end to drive with a slower speed. See parameter min_slow_down_speed.
max_turn_rate_deg_p_sfloat30.0Maximum turning rate of the vehicle. Limits AGV's speed on the trajectory.
allow_drive_max_wheel_ang_diff_degfloat5.0Maximum angle difference [deg] for wheels before AGV is allowed to start driving.
auto_moving_delay_msecint0Delay the start of the drive by given time [ms]. 0 = disable
stop_and_hold_moving_delay_msecint2000Delay time [ms] before AGV is released from StopAndHold symbolic point when timer-based release is used.
stop_and_hold_modeint0Defines release behavior at StopAndHold point after stopping: -1 = ignore stopAndHold points, 0 = release with timer, 1 = release with supervisor actuator section signal, 2 = release with fleet control signal, 3 = release with supervisor message 3011
stop_and_hold_stop_distance_offsetfloat0.0Stopping distance offset from stop-and-hold point. Aooly negative offset if AGV stops too late.
start_offset_slowdown_enabledint0Enables start offset slowdown feature that limits speed and acceleration if the error relative to the path is larger than start_offset_slowdown_heading_limit_deg or start_offset_slowdown_dist_limit when starting a drive.
start_offset_slowdown_heading_limit_degfloat2.0Start offset slowdown is activated if AGV's heading offset from the route is more than the given value [deg].
start_offset_slowdown_dist_limitfloat0.1Start offset slowdown is activated if AGV's distance offset from the route is more than the given value [m].
start_offset_slowdown_release_delay_msint500If start offset slowdown has been activated, the offset values must be within the slowdown_heading_offset_limitandslowdown_dist_offset_limitforthe givenrelease delay beforetheslowdownisreleased.
start_offset_slowdown_mot_ctrl_max_wheel_v_fwfloat0.8Maximum drive wheel forwards velocity when start offset slowdown is active [m/s]. Only used if smaller than the original limit.
start_offset_slowdown_mot_ctrl_max_wheel_v_bwfloat0.8Maximum drive wheel backwards velocity when start offset slowdown is active [m/s]. Only used if smaller than the original limit.
start_offset_slowdown_mot_ctrl_max_wheel_accfloat0.5Maximum aceleration when start offset slowdown is active [m/s^2]. Only used if smaller than the original limit.
max_turn_rate_deg_p_s_arrfloat[]30.0Maximum turning rate of the vehicle that can be selected to replace the default limit. Limits AGV's speed on the trajectory.
symbol_point_enter_distfloat0.2Determine entry distance from a symbolic point that AGV is occupying. Used to trigger virtual tags on symbolic points.
symbol_point_exit_distfloat0.25Determine exit distance from a symbolic point that AGV is occupying. Used to trigger virtual tags on symbolic points.
symbol_point_path_ready_machine_reported_inside_distfloat1.0If path is ready and AGV is closer than this distance to the drive order end symbolic point, the AGV is considered to be inside the symbolic point. Does not include buffer lanes.
max_c_change_limitfloat1.0
speed_timer_sint10Set error on two conditions: 1) If measured speed differs for the given time from reference (by at least max_speed_diff). 2) If AGV is not starting to move within the given time from reference increase (for motor controllers without internal PID).
go_to_stby_delay_msecint4000Delay when changing from manual state or estop to standby.
spd_ctrl_max_steer_ang_err_degfloat5.0Limits AGV's speed if steering angle differs more than the parameter value from the target value. Note: For omni AGV's this must be enabled by omni_steer_ang_err_speed_limit_enabled.
spd_ctrl_max_dist_err_per_sfloat0.1
veh_steer_angle_corr_coefffloat1.0The offset corrected steer angle measurement is multiplied with this coefficient to correct a ratio error between measurement angle and wheel angle.
veh_steer_control_rev_corrfloat1.0Steer angle correction coefficient compensating for a steering to curvature error proportional to the steering angle when reversing.
veh_steer_control_fwd_corrfloat1.0Steer angle correction coefficient compensating for a steering to curvature error proportional to the steering angle when driving forwards.
veh_steer_angle_corr_offsetfloat0.0Offset correctng the zero-angle error of the raw steer angle measurement.
park_brake_on_delay_msint1000Delay for setting the park brake after vehicle has been stopped.
speed_inversion_in_mode_changeint0Changes speed direction in mode change pivoting to make the mode change wheel positions result in the same pivoting direction as normal pivoting.
stop_on_specified_route_pointsint0Enables stop enroute points feature. When enabled, AGV will StopAndHold at enroute STOP points specified in the drive order.
stop_enroute_max_curpos_diff_from_stop_pt_metersfloat0.01Maximum straight-line distance [m] from enroute STOP point when StopAndHold can trigger.
stop_enroute_speed_mpsfloat0.02Driving reference speed [m/s] when approaching stop point.
stop_enroute_speed_activation_dist_mfloat0.1Distance [m] from enroute stop point when slowdown speed should be used as a reference.
stop_enroute_minimum_point_to_point_pose_dist_to_stop_pointfloat0.02Maximum distance [m] along trajectory from enroute STOP point when StopAndHold can trigger.
drive_order_along_route_start_max_diff_heading_degfloat15.0Maximum heading difference [deg] between the vehicle and a segment point for it to be considered a start candidate.
drive_order_along_route_start_max_diff_distfloat0.2Maximum distance [m] between the vehicle and a segment point for it to be considered a start candidate.
drive_order_along_route_start_max_diff_alt_distfloat0.05Close segment points are considered alternative start candidates if their distance from the vehicle is shorter than the distance to the closest accepted segment point + this parameter.
drive_order_along_route_directionint0The drive direction of binary drive order: 0 = reverse, 1 = forward.
drive_order_along_route_max_vfloat0.5The maximum velocity [m/s] during binary drive order
drive_order_along_route_max_distfloat0.5The maximum distance [m] of binary drive order along the closest route
drive_offset_max_lonfloat0.05Maximum requested longitudinal offset [m] from route when driving to a symbolic point.
drive_offset_max_transfloat0.05Maximum requested transversal offset [m] from route when driving to a symbolic point.
drive_offset_max_headingfloat4.0Maximum requested heading offset [deg] from route when driving to a symbolic point.
drive_offset_enable_speed_rampint0Enables speed ramp when arriving to the symbolic point with offset.
drive_offset_apply_distfloat-1.0Distance [m] from drive order end point before drive offsets will start to apply. Negative value enables offsets always.
drive_offset_apply_modeint00 = Negative speed flips transversal offset. 1 = Apply offsets as is given. Speed direction does not affect offsets.

Standalone route driver

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
route_driver_enabledint0Enables standalone/route drive feature.
route_driver_max_diff_h_degfloat15.0Maximum heading difference [deg] between the vehicle and a segment point for it to be considered a start candidate.
route_driver_max_diff_dist_mfloat0.2Maximum distance [m] between the vehicle and a segment point for it to be considered a start candidate.
route_driver_max_diff_alt_dist_mfloat0.05Close segment points are considered alternative start candidates if their distance from the vehicle is shorter than the distance to the closest accepted segment point + this parameter.
route_driver_max_seg_cnt_in_drive_orderint30Maximum number of segments in one drive order.
route_driver_dest_update_enabledint0Enables option of updating destination during drive.
route_driver_dest_update_stop_distfloat0.0Maximum distance [m] to drive when planning route for destination update during drive. No stopping if zero.
route_driver_start_drive_angle_cost_per_degfloat0.08Start angle cost (angle between AGV frame and start-segment heading) that is added to the route length when calculating shortest to drive. No angle cost if zero.
route_driver_end_segment_angle_cost_per_degfloat0.00End angle cost (angle between AGV frame and end-segment heading) that is added to the route length when calculating shortest route to drive. No angle cost if zero.
route_driver_pivot_point_turning_cost_per_degfloat0.08Pivot point cost (if needed to pivot) that is added to the route length when calculating shortest route to drive. No angle cost if zero.

Return to route

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
rtr_use_custom_routeint1Sets the return to route mode: 0 = Shortest possible straight route, 1 = Custom route, 2 = Strictly curvature limited custom route.
rtr_max_distfloat2.0Defines the maximum search distance [m] for the first target point on the route.
rtr_speedfloat0.3Upper threshold [m/s] for the rtr trajectory speed.
rtr_max_head_err_degfloat5.0Lower threshold for the angle [deg] between the vehicle and the route for return to route to be possible.
rtr_already_on_route_distfloat0.1If the distance to nearest route segment point is smaller than this value AGV is considered to be on route. The return route is calculated but not driven.
rtr_max_head_difffloat90.0Maximum heading difference between the vehicle and the target point on the route.
rtr_control_point_distfloat2.5Defines the maximum distance from close point (see rtr_max_dist) to a custom return to route target point.
rtr_control_point_start_smooth_distfloat0.8Defines the distance to the first control point in the custom route creation.
rtr_control_point_end_smooth_distfloat0.8Defines the minimum distance between the last two control points in the custom route creation.
rtr_safe_steer_angle_margin_degfloat4.0For very limited steering cases the margin to the steering angle limits determines route acceptance, if the margin exceeds this limit the shortest route is selected.
rtr_omni_steer_limit_recovery_time_msint20000Heavily limited omni stuck in warning_limited_steering_active too long time trigger limited steering recovery. Active only when rtr_use_custom_route is set to value 2.

VDA5050

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
vdma_hoststring127.0.0.1Hostname or IP of the MQTT broker the VDMA interface should connect to.
vdma_portint1883The port the MQTT broker for VDMA interface is on.
vdma_manufacturerstringNavitecThe name of the AGV manufacturer for the VDMA interface.
vdma_serial_numberstring0001The serial number of the AGV for the VDMA interface.
vdma_interface_namestringuagvThe interface name part of the MQTT topics
vdma_visualization_interval_msint1000The update interval [ms] for the visualization topic. 0 = disable.
vdma_topic_override_versionint0Override the version number part of the MQTT topic name. 0 = use default (no override).
vdma_mqtt_userstringUsername for connecting to the MQTT broker.
vdma_mqtt_passwordstringPassword for connecting to the MQTT broker.
vdma_ssl_modeint10 = disabled, 1 = follow the general Navitrol settings (default), 2 = enable with separate settings (even if SSL is otherwise disabled).
vdma_ssl_agv_certificate_filestringThe name of the certificate file to be used by the AGV. Used only when vdma_ssl_mode set to 2.
