ext_loc_check_path_ready_distfloat0.1Determines if AGV is close to a stop point. It defines the area for handling the final stopping of the AGV and erroneous driving situations.
ext_loc_stop_distance_offsetfloat0.0Additional offset for stopping if stop point given in external localization coordinates. Apply negative offset if AGV stops too late.
ext_loc_path_ready_max_dist_errfloat0.003Maximum distance from external localization stop point at the start of drive to decide if drive is ready.
ext_loc_h_diff_use_two_lines_degfloat15.0Deduction for using two lines instead of one. When heading difference between data matrix line and line through sensors is higher than parameter value, use two lines.
ext_loc_localize_without_pos_ctrl_checksint00 = external localization is ignored when position control sanity checks are not passed (e.g. route heading differs too much from line heading), 1 = localize without pos ctrl checks.
ext_loc_docking_max_h_err_degfloat30.0Maximum heading error to the defined target heading when docking is active (ext_loc_docking_enabled).
ext_loc_eth_modelint[]-1Model of ethernet external localization sensor: 0 = PGV camera, 1 = reserved, 2 = SICK Lector
ext_loc_eth_ipstring[]
ext_loc_eth_portint[]5333Port of the device.
ext_loc_eth_protocolint[]2Protocol for PGV ethernet connection: 1 = Stream, 2 = DGRAM
ext_loc_eth_swap_bytesint0Swap bytes in PGV external localization ethernet interface: 0 = little endian, 1 = big endian.
ext_loc_config_filestring[]
ext_loc_config_msg_interval_msint[]100SICK Lector sensor configuration command transmit interval [ms].
pgv_enableduint0PGV sensor enabled.
pgv_x_offsetfloat[]0.0X-offset [m] from the nominal position of the device.
pgv_y_offsetfloat[]0.0Y-offset [m] from the nominal position of the device.
pgv_z_offsetfloat[]0.0Z-offset [m] from the nominal position of the device.
pgv_angle_offset_degfloat[]0.0Angle offset [deg] from the nominal position of the device.
pgv_can_node_idint[]0Node ID of PGV camera: 0 = disabled, 1...127 = valid node ID.
pgv_modelint[]00 = Not defined, 1 = safePGV.
pgv_max_missing_msgint5Amount of missing messages for error to be triggered.
pgv_cam_res_xfloat0.0001The x-axis resolution [m] of the PGV cameras.
pgv_cam_res_yfloat0.0001The y-axis resolution [m] of the PGV cameras.
pgv_cam_res_hfloat0.1The heading resolution [deg] of the PGV cameras.
pgv_looking_upwardsint0PGV looking upwards to QR code above the machine.
pgv_to_supervisor_nth_syncint1PGV data is send to supervisor every n:th time after it is received.

ROS

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
ros_enabledint0Enable ROS Interface.
ros_log_modeint1Save ROS logs: 0 = No logs, 1 = Text logs, 2 = Text and binary data logs
ros_log_duration_sint100Maximum age [s] for ROS logs to be saved before getting removed.
ros_ipstring0.0.0.0IP address of the device running ROS.
ros_port_inint13579Navigation SW port number for receiving ROS messages.
ros_port_outint24680ROS port number.
ros_auto_configint1Convert automatically Navitrol parameters into ROS format: 0 = No, 1 = All, 2 = All except URDF
ros_send_scan_dataint0Bitmapped number that determines which scanner data should be sent to ROS. Bit 0 = Rear, Bit 1 = Front, Bit 2 = Measurement 0, Bit 3 = Measurement 1
ros_localization_enabledint0Use external pose from ROS.
ros_pose_topic_namestringros_agv_poseROS's pose topic name.
ros_pose_topic_typeint1ROS's pose topic type: 1 = geometry_msgs/msg/PoseWithCovarianceStamped, 2 = nav_msgs/msg/Odometry
ros_pose_quality_topic_namestringposition_confidenceROS's pose quality topic name.
ros_pose_quality_min_valuefloat0.0ROS's pose quality minimum value.
ros_pose_quality_max_valuefloat100.0ROS's pose quality maximum value.
ros_odo_enabledint0Use external odometry from ROS.
ros_odo_topic_namestringodomROS's odometry topic name.
ros_odo_topic_typeint1ROS's odometry topic type: 1 = nav_msgs/msg/Odometry, 2 = geometry_msgs/msg/TwistStamped
ros_drive_agvint0Defines if Navitrol drives ROS AGV.
ros_use_forkint0Use ROS fork actuator.
ros_fork_height_min_value_offsetfloat0.0Zero position offset for ROS fork height actuator [m].
ros_fork_reach_min_value_offsetfloat0.0Zero position offset for ROS fork reach actuator [m].
ros_fork_height_negative_incrementint0ROS fork height actuator increases with negative sign.
ros_fork_reach_negative_incrementint0ROS fork reach actuator increases with negative sign.
ros_fork_test_modeint0Use ros_fork_*_test parameters for ROS fork command.
ros_fork_height_testfloat0.0ROS fork height value.
ros_fork_reach_testfloat0.0ROS fork reach value.
ros_scan_mute_testint0Mute ROS scanner.
ros_publish_map_to_odom_tfint1Publish Navitrol's transform of coordinate frames map -> odometry in ROS.
ros_publish_odom_to_agv_tfint1Publish Navitrol's transform of coordinate frames odometry -> AGV in ROS.
ros_publish_agv_tfint1Publish AGV (static) transforms (AGV -> sensor) in ROS.
ros_slam_enabledint0Enables ROS simultaneous localization and mapping.
ros_slam_scannerint1Scanner to use for SLAM: 0 = Rear, 1 = Front, 2 = Measurement 0, 3 = Measurement 1
ros_slam_map_resolutionfloat0.05Grid resolution to use for the map created by SLAM [m]. Recommended to keep at 0.05 m.
ros_camera_typeint0ROS camera type: 0 = No camera, 1 = RealSense D400 series
ros_camera_pos_xfloat0.0ROS camera position on x-axis in AGV coordinates [m].
ros_camera_pos_yfloat0.0ROS camera position on y-axis in AGV coordinates [m].
ros_camera_pos_zfloat0.0ROS camera position on z-axis in AGV coordinates [m].
ros_camera_angle_rollfloat0.0ROS camera orientation on x-axis in AGV coordinates [deg].
ros_camera_angle_pitchfloat0.0ROS camera orientation on y-axis in AGV coordinates [deg].
ros_camera_angle_yawfloat0.0ROS camera orientation on z-axis in AGV coordinates [deg].
ros_camera_min_obstacle_heightfloat0.05Minimum height from ground to mark item as an obstacle [m].
ros_camera_max_obstacle_heightfloat2.0Maximum height from ground to mark item as an obstacle [m].
ros_camera_max_obstacle_distancefloat3.0Maximum distance from sensor to mark item as an obstacle [m].
ros_camera_obstacle_remembering_timefloat15.0How long to remember an obstacle outside of camera's field of view [s].
ros_camera_vertical_fovfloat58.0ROS camera's vertical field of view [deg].
ros_camera_horizontal_fovfloat87.0ROS camera's horizontal field of view [deg].
ros_obst_det_scanner_enabled_arrint[]0Use ROS scanner for obstacle detection and avoidance (up to 4).
ros_obst_det_scanner_topic_arrstring[]
ros_obst_det_scanner_frame_arrstring[]
ros_obst_det_create_scanner_frame_arrint[]10 = Don't create coordinate frame, 1 = Create coordinate frame and transform for the scanner using ros_obst_det_scanner_<x/y/h/upside_down>_arr parameters
ros_obst_det_scanner_x_arrfloat[]0.0ROS scanner x-coordinate with respect to navigation point [m].
ros_obst_det_scanner_y_arrfloat[]0.0ROS scanner y-coordinate with respect to navigation point [m].
ros_obst_det_scanner_h_arrfloat[]0.0ROS scanner orientation with respect to navigation point [deg].
ros_obst_det_scanner_upside_down_arrint[]0Defines, if the ROS scanner is installed upside down.
ros_scan_filter_modeint0Filter scan measurements for noisy data: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Cluster filter, 2 = Intense filter
ros_scan_filter_max_range_difffloat0.1How much an individual scan point's range can differ at max from the surrounding scan points to prevent filtering out [m].
ros_scan_filter_sector_sizeint3Amount of surrounding scan points (from one side) to take into comparison with the current scan point.
ros_scan_filter_min_cluster_sizeint3Minimum amount of scan points needed in a cluster group to prevent filtering out.
ros_pointcloud_scanner_enabledint0Convert ROS2 PointCloud2 messages to 2D laser scanner measurements
ros_pointcloud_scanner_selectionint0For which 2D scanner to convert pointcloud data: 0 - Rear, 1 - Front, 2 - Measurement 0, 3 - Measurement 1
ros_pointcloud_scanner_resolutionfloat1.0Target angle resolution for 2D scan output [deg]
ros_pointcloud_scanner_input_topicstringROS topic name for pointcloud data
ros_pointcloud_scanner_min_heightfloat0.0Minimum height of pointcloud data (with respect to AGV frame) to project for 2D laser scanner measurement [m]
ros_pointcloud_scanner_max_heightfloat2.0Maximum height of pointcloud data (with respect to AGV frame) to project for 2D laser scanner measurement [m]
ros_obst_av_modeintROS_OBST_AV_MODE_NONEUse Obstacle avoidance V2. 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled
ros_obst_av_zone_modeint1Defines the behavior of obstacle avoidance zones. 0 = Obstacle detection and avoidance allowed everywhere, 1 = Obstacle detection allowed everywhere and avoidance only inside zones, 2 = Obstacle detection and avoidance allowed only inside zones
ros_path_send_every_nth_pointint5When sending path to ROS, send every nth point. 0 = send all points
ros_obst_av_bypass_velocityfloat0.3Maximum velocity [m/s] during the ros obstacle bypass when out of nominal route.
ros_obst_av_max_wait_time_secint10Maximum waiting time [s] during bypass for a valid ros path before raising a warning WARNING_UNABLE_TO_BYPASS_OBSTACLE. 0 = never raise an error
ros_obst_av_soft_stop_enabledint1Enable soft stops during obstacle avoidance V2. 0 = Disabled, do hard stop. 1 = Enabled, do soft stop
ros_obst_av_reverse_to_nominal_modeint0Reversing mode to nominal route if agv is stuck during bypass: 0 = Don't reverse, 1 = Backtrack the driven path
ros_obst_av_max_wait_time_before_reversing_secint10Time [s] to wait replanning before returning back to nominal route. Only relevant if ros_obst_av_reverse_to_nominal_mode is not zero.
ros_obst_av_return_to_nominal_max_dist_difffloat0.05After reaching this distance [m] from the diverge point, the return is considered completed.
ros_obst_av_return_to_nominal_max_angle_diff_degfloat5.0After reaching this angle difference [deg] from the diverge point, the return is considered completed.
ros_obst_av_bypass_start_slow_distfloat1.5Distance [m] before bypass diverge point from nominal to start soft slow.
ros_obst_av_fleet_control_request_timeout_sint10Maximum time [s] to wait for Fleet Control response on bypass request. Request is considered rejected on timeout.
ros_obst_det_slow_distfloat5.0Distance [m] before detected collision point where the AGV will activate soft slow. Collision point is the first traj point where obstacle would enter the obst_free zones.
ros_obst_det_stop_distfloat2.0Distance [m] before detected collision point where the AGV will stop. Collision point is the first traj point where obstacle would enter the obst_free zones.
ros_obst_free_zone_leftfloat0.10The margin [m] around the AGV left dimension that has to be free of obstacles when using obstacle avoidance V2.
ros_obst_free_zone_rightfloat0.10The margin [m] around the AGV right dimension that has to be free of obstacles when using obstacle avoidance V2.
ros_obst_free_zone_frontfloat0.10The margin [m] around the AGV front dimension that has to be free of obstacles when using obstacle avoidance V2.
ros_obst_free_zone_rearfloat0.10The margin [m] around the AGV rear dimension that has to be free of obstacles when using obstacle avoidance V2.
ros_obst_free_zone_gain_for_planningfloat1.3Multiplier for the AGV obstacle free zone for route planning.
ros_obst_det_distint10How far ahead to check for collisions along the trajectory [m].
ros_obst_det_max_scan_distfloat0.0Scanner range measurements exceeding the value [m] are ignored for collision detection / bypass route planning. 0.0 = Use values from ros_obst_det_dist / ros_obst_av_max_plan_dist.
ros_obst_av_min_turning_radiusfloat0.4Minimum turning radius for obstacle avoidance V2 routes [m].
ros_obst_av_bypass_trigger_wait_timefloat0.0How long to wait [s] before triggering bypass route calculation when distance to the obstacle is less than ros_obst_av_bypass_planning_dist.
ros_obst_av_bypass_trigger_reset_timefloat0.0How long to wait [s] before resetting the bypass route calculation trigger (e.g. if obstacle is detected only momentarily).
ros_obst_av_bypass_planning_distfloat3.0How much before the (first) collision point to start looking for bypass route [m] (maximum value). This value should be bigger than ros_obst_av_bypass_start_dist.
ros_obst_av_bypass_start_distfloat1.0How much before the (first) collision point to diverge the bypass route from nominal [m] (maximum value).
ros_obst_av_bypass_end_distfloat1.0How much after the (last) collision point to merge the bypass route to nominal [m] (minimum value).
ros_obst_av_plan_step_distfloat1.0Incremential distance for next planning target after failed one [m].
ros_obst_av_max_plan_distfloat20.0How far ahead (along the nominal trajectory) to check collisions and free space for a return point to nominal trajectory [m].
ros_obst_av_max_plan_dist_prioritizedint0Prioritize calculating bypass routes directly to the maximum planning distance ahead.
ros_obst_av_min_diverge_distfloat0.3Minimum distance to use for suggested diverge point from current AGV location [m].
ros_obst_av_publish_mapint1Whether to publish ROS global costmap (for logging purposes). 0 = Disabled, 1 = Only costmap updates, 2 = Full costmap

Miscellaneous

Logging

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
log_trigger_pass_to_supervisorint0If set to 1, then fleet control/Monitor log triggers are passed to Supervisor
log_eventsint0Enables logging of all internal events between different threads.
log_scannerint0Log the laser scanner data details. 5 = max level.
log_correlationint0Log correlation calculations used for localization. 5 = max level.
log_positioningint0Log localization calculations. 5 = max level.
log_deadrecint0Log dead reckoning calculations. 5 = max level.
log_reflector_posint0Log reflector based localization details. 5 = max level.
log_thrd_localizeint0Log state and events of localize thread.
log_sensorsint0Enables logging of detailed RLS sensor data.
log_veh_inte_ethint0Log ethernet supervisor message details: 0 = message info, 4 = all bytes.
log_get_trajint0Log trajectory generation details. 3 = max level.
log_canint0Log primary CAN bus details, including all messages bytes. 2 = max level.
log_can2int0Log secondary CAN bus details, including all messages bytes. 2 = max level.
log_can_msgsint0Log parsed and built can message data.
log_bmsint0Enables logging of external battery management system related details.
log_motor_controllersint0Log motor controller details.
log_timer_threadint0Enables logging of internal timer details for a specific thread.
log_keyb_ctrl_ioint0Enables logging of keyboard control details from Monitor.
log_pos_ini_reflint0Enables logging of reflector-based position initialization details.
log_segparsingint0Enables logging of segment parsing details.
log_pattern_detectionint0Enables logging of pattern detection calculation details.
log_pallet_detectionint0Enables logging of pallet detection calculation details.
log_speed_limitint0Enables logging of active speed limitations.
log_imuint0Log IMU details. 1 = log details & parsed data, 2 = raw data.
log_rackingint0Enables logging of warehouse racking details.
log_driving_with_stop_ptsint0Enables logging of driving with stop points details.
log_omni_controlint0Log omni control details. 1 = log drive time, 2 = route filtering, 3 = speed limits.
log_can_summaryint0Log CAN msg summary. 0 = on ERR condition only, 1 = periodically.
log_ext_target_detuint0Enables logging of external target detection data. 0 - disabled, 1 - enabled
log_dynamic_mapint0Log dynamic map - debug version only: 5 = max level.
log_modbusint0Enables logging of parsed and built modbus message data.
log_ext_fleet_controlint0Log external fleet control: 0 = disable, 1 = enable, 2 = max amount of details
log_gpsint0Log GPS localization details: 0 = disable, 1 = log outputs, 2 = log antenna points, 3 = log messages
log_ext_locint0Log external localization: 0 = disable, 1 = enable, values 2...3 for more detailed logging with some sensors
log_trailer_transportint0Enables logging of trailer transport details.
log_coupled_driveint1Log coupled drive control details.
log_rtr_generationint0Enables logging of return to route generation.
log_sys_resoures_interval_sint10Time interval [s] to log systemresources:0=disable
log_rosint0Log ros specific details: 0 = disable, 1 = enable, 2 = log detailed path information
log_obst_detectionint0Log obstacle detection: 0 = none, 1 = result line counts, 2 = detailed logging, 3 = log all lines
log_ethercatint0Log EtherCAT communication details: 0 = min level, 3 = max amount of details
log_pointcloud_interfaceint0Log pointcloud interface: 0 = No, 1 = Basic, 2 = Detailed
log_table_detectionint0Log table detection details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed
log_actuatorsint0Log actuator control details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed
log_profinetint0Log profinet interface details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed, 2 = log binary data
log_dockingint0Log docking details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed
log_simoveint0Log simove details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed, 2 = all bytes
log_target_detectionint0Log target detection details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed
log_blind_drivingint0Log blind driving details: 0 = general, 1 = detailed
log_dump_thrmon_txt_log_sizeint10Size [MB] of text log to dump on thread monitoring error.
log_err_txt_log_dump_sizeint50Size [MB] of text log to dump on error.
log_loc_log_sizeint45Size [MB] of localization binary log buffer.
log_pos_cont_log_sizeint15Size [MB] of position controller binary log buffer.
log_coupled_drive_log_sizeint10Size [MB] of coupled drive binary log buffer.
log_trajectory_log_sizeint10Size [MB] of trajectory binary log buffer.
log_cont_log_chunk_sizeint30Size [MB] of continuous log chunk.
log_cont_log_chunksint10Number of continuous log chunks.
log_long_log_file_sizeint10Size [MB] of long log file.
log_long_log_filesint0Number of long log files.
log_cont_log_when_moving_onlyint1Defines if continuous log data should be recorded only when moving.
log_cont_log_stopped_timerint5Time [s] to continue logging after stopping.
log_dump_on_error_cooldown_secsint15Minimum cooldown time [s] between dumping automatic error logs.
log_dump_ros_logsint0Defines if ROS logging should be included in Navitrol log file.
log_dump_3d_positioning_logsint0Defines if 3d positioning logging should be included in Navitrol log file.
log_dump_on_estop_max_filesint0Maximum number of log files triggered by FSTOP on ESTOP to keep on disk.
log_dump_on_fstop_max_filesint0Maximum number of log files triggered by any FSTOP to keep on disk.
log_dump_on_error_max_filesint5Maximum number of log files from error dumps to keep on disk.
log_dump_on_specific_errors_only_arrint[]0Trigger automatic error log for defined errors/warnings only: 0 = Not defined
log_dump_on_any_error_max_filesint0Maximum number of log files from general error dumps to keep on disk.
log_dump_external_max_filesint10Maximum number of log files from external trigger to keep on disk.
log_dump_vdma_max_filesint20Maximum number of log files triggered by VDMA to keep on disk.
log_dump_thrmon_max_filesint20Maximum number of log files triggered by thread monitoring to keep on disk.
log_dump_remote_mon_max_filesint20Maximum number of log files triggered from Monitor/Fleet Control to keep on disk.
log_vehicle_stopped_speedfloat0.05Stops continuous logging and increases startinfo update interval when AGV's speed is less than the given value [m/s].
logging_rate_warning_limitint800000Amount of characters per second for high logging rate warning to be triggered.
log_to_navigationlogint0Enables logging of position to separate navigation log text file.
log_battery_file_size_mbint20Maximum size [MB] for battery log file.
log_battery_update_interval_msint1000Interval [ms] for writing a new line to battery log.
log_sensor_fusionint0Log sensor fusion details: 0 = disable, 1 = log location estimates, 2 = log location and velocity, 3 = log all
log_vdma_extraint0Enable extra debug logging by vda5050 related features.

System information and configuration

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
cpu_core_exclusion_maskuint0CPU core exclusion mask - any bit set means that corresponding CPU core should not be used
overcommit_memoryint2overcommit_memory - NOT to be modified without Navitec consultation
overcommit_ratioint90overcommit_ratio - NOT to be modified without Navitec consultation
memory_lock_size_mbint300Minimum amount of RAM memory initially locked; 0 = disable memory locking
syscmd_controluint0Consult SW provider for use cases
syscmd_legacyint01 = Use old legacy style for system commands - consult SW provider for use cases
beep_modeint0Usage of IPC beeper: 0 = no beeps, 1 = battery low, 2 = battery low & every 10 seconds
min_free_disk_space_mbint1000Minimum available disk space [MB] required when dumping log files or writing teach data.
check_threads_alive_intervalint750Interval [ms] for thread alive checking by thread monitoring.
check_threads_alive_interval_ms_high_prioint1000Maximum thread alive update interval [ms] for high priority threads: 0 = disable
check_threads_alive_interval_ms_medium_prioint2500Maximum thread alive update interval [ms] for medium priority threads: 0 = disable
check_threads_alive_interval_ms_low_prioint5000Maximum thread alive update interval [ms] for low priority threads: 0 = disable
threads_alive_shutdown_timeout_msint10000Maximum time [ms] to wait for non-responsive thread before shutdown: 0 = disable
check_threads_alive_warning_intervalint750Maximum time interval [ms] for a thread to report being alive if not blocked. Exceeding this time results in warning on console.
max_thread_check_lagint750Maximum acceptable lag [ms] for thread alive checking by thread monitoring.
socket_max_syn_backlog_sizeint5Maximum size for SYN backlog size, which is given as argument when starting to listen to a stream.
socket_write_timeout_msint200Generic maximum acceptable time [ms] for writing data packet to socket.
require_realtime_kernelint1Require realtime kernel to run Navigation SW: 0 = realtime kernel not required, 1 = realtime kernel required.

Battery and charging

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
battery_log_modeint0Log battery details: 0 = disable, 1 = log voltage and driveWheelV, 2 = log percentage and driveWheelV, 3 = SoC + wheelV + current + SoH + status.
battery_level_knownint01 = read battery percentage from external device (motor controller or bms), 0 = calculate it from battery voltage.
battery_alert_fromint0Battery Alert Mode: -1 = no alert, 0 = alert from low voltage, 1 = alert from low battery percentage
battery_alert_percentagefloat5.0Warning is set on low battery level [%] (battery_alert_from = 1).
battery_alert_voltagefloat29.5Warning is set on low battery voltage (battery_alert_from = 0).
battery_voltage_gainfloat0.01Gain for filtering battery voltage output.
battery_empty_voltagefloat24.0Battery level is set to zero when battery voltage is less than empty voltage.
battery_voltage1float25.4Battery level is calculated between 0 and battery_percentage1 when current battery voltage is between battery_empty_voltage and battery_voltage1.
battery_percentage1float5.0Battery level [%] when current battery voltage is at value battery_voltage1.
battery_voltage2float26.85Battery level is calculated between battery_percentage1 and battery_percentage2 when current battery voltage is between battery_voltage1 and battery_voltage2.
battery_percentage2float60.0Battery level [%] when current battery voltage is at value battery_voltage2.
battery_full_voltagefloat29.1Battery level is calculated between battery_percentage2 and 100% when current battery voltage is between battery_voltage2 and battery_full_voltage
battery_voltage_input_scalefloat0.0Scale battery voltage input by multiplying with this value. 0 = do not scale.
battery_update_interval_msint1000Battery value update interval [ms].
battery_high_temperature_warning_limit_Cint0If battery temperature [C] increases over this limit a warning set. 0 = disabled, 127 = max
battery_high_temperature_error_limit_Cint0If battery temperature [C] increases over this limit an error set. 0 = disabled, 127 = max
battery_overtemperature_drive_distfloat0.0Defines the overtemperature emergency drive distance [m]. Smaller than 0.2 = disabled.
battery_overtemperature_drive_max_vfloat0.4The maximum drive speed [m/s] when driving forward from the resource after the unload.
charging_cmd_sourceint1Source of charging request: 0 = disabled, 1 = fleet control, 2 = opportunity charging, 3 = external source, 4 = project specific
charging_opp_min_at_charger_timer_msint3000Timer [ms] for opportunity charging which defines how long vehicle has to stay in charging station before charging is requested.
charge_request_interval_msint1000Charger request interval [ms].
charging_prevents_drivingint1When charging is active: 0 = driving allowed, 1 = driving preventented with soft stop.
charging_collector_arm_extend_optionint0Onboard charger collector arm extend options. 0 = extend one side only, 1 = extend two sides separately.
extbatt_if_typeint-1Battery managment system type: -1 = disabled, 0 = MasterVolt, 1 = SL BMS, 2 = Jungheinrich, 3 = RoboteQ, 4 = Voltabox, 5 = Ethernet Supervisor (min ver 4), 6 = MEB battery, 7 = JLN, 8 = Wiferion
extbatt_if_max_interval_msint10000Maximum update interval [ms].

Licensing

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
license_server_addrstringLicense server url/address
license_warning_period_daysint14Set warning time [days] for license expiry; 0 = No warning, >0 = Set warning corresponding number of days before license expires

Miscellaneous

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
worker_core_exclusion_maskuint0CPU core exclusion mask for localize worker threads - any bit set means that corresponding CPU core should not be used
abort_on_thread_freezeint0Instantly abort on thread freeze
worker_thread_priority_overrideint-1Override worker thread priority
dds_pointcloud2_topic_namestring[]

raw_rpm_treshold_for_speed_zeroingint30Motor revolution values below the treshold are zeroed to prevent position creeping caused by flickering values from sensorless motor drives

blink_ahead_min_distfloat1.0Defines the minimum distance ahead of the curve where the blinker is activated.
blink_curvaturefloat0.5Defines how sharp curves shall activate the blinking, curvature=1/radius.
blink_ahead_gainfloat2.0Speed factor [s] extending the distance ahead of the curve where the blinker is activated. distance = speed x blink_ahead_gain.
odometry_sourceintODOMETRY_SOURCE_UNDEFINEDPrimary communication interface for machine control and odometry. Needs to be defined if several interfaces are used. 0 = Undefined, 1 = CAN, 2 = Ethernet, 3 = EtherCAT, 4 = Serial, 5 = SIMOVE
physical_binary_inputs_nint0Number of physical (or mapped IO inside Navigation SW) binary inputs.
physical_integer_inputs_nint0Number of physical (or mapped IO inside Navigation SW) integer inputs.
physical_float_inputs_nint0Number of physical (or mapped IO inside Navigation SW) float inputs.

physical_integer_outputs_nint0Number of physical (or mapped IO inside Navigation SW) integer outputs
physical_float_outputs_nint0Number of physical (or mapped IO inside Navigation SW) float outputs.
